content: I was considering coilovers, but I'm not sure if they're worth the extra cost. I'm mainly looking to improve my handling and cornering ability, but I also want to make sure my car is still comfortable for daily driving. Do you think coilovers would be overkill for a daily driver like me, or would they still be a good investment? By the way, I've already experienced the benefits of suspension adjustments at the autocross event I mentioned earlier - after making some tweaks, I was able to shave off 2.5 seconds from my average time.
